name.description: Name of the card, kebab cased.

ui.description: Data to be shown on the card interface.

title.description: Title to be displayed on the card.

subscription.description: Whether a user can subscribe to this card.

tableOfContents.description: Whether to display the table of contents.

hooks.description: Defines actions to be taken during different stages of a card execution

afterSubmit.description: Actions to be executed in order after the card has been submitted.

version.description: Schema version that this card requires. If a client is **lower** than this version, the `fallbackText` will be rendered.

fallbackText.description: Text shown when the client doesn't support the version specified (may contain markdown).

backgroundImage.description: An image to use as the background of the card.

speak.description: Specifies what should be spoken for this entire card. This is simple text or SSML fragment.

lang.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 language used in the card. Used to localize any date/time functions.

CardscriptField.description: Adds various properties to extend base Input types.

icon.description: Name of an icon to display alongside this element.

title.description: Strong text to clearly identify the intent of the element.

Action.RefreshTasks.description: When invoked this will refresh the users tasks.

Action.RefreshWatching.description: When invoked this will refresh the users watched cards.

Action.RefreshRemit.description: When invoked this will refresh the app's remit.

Action.PushCard.description: When invoked this will push the new card on the routing history.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

Action.ReplaceCard.description: When invoked this will replace the current entry in the history with the new route.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

Action.OpenUrl.description: When invoked, show the given url either by launching it in an external web browser or showing in-situ with embedded web browser.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title

Action.ShowCard.description: Defines an AdaptiveCard which is shown to the user when the button or link is clicked.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title

Action.Cancel.description: Allows to cancel out of a form.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title

Action.Save.description: Allows to save a form to continue later.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title

Action.Submit.description: Gathers input fields, merges with optional data field, and sends an event to the client. It is up to the client to determine how this data is processed. For example: With BotFramework bots, the client would send an activity through the messaging medium to the bot.

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action.

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title

data.description: Initial data that input fields will be combined with. These are essentially 'hidden' properties.

AdaptiveCard.description: Root element in an Adaptive Card.

actions.description: The Actions to show in the card's action bar.

body.description: The card elements to show in the primary card region.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the card is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

separator.description: When `true`, draw a separating line at the top of the element.

Input.Choice.description: Describes a choice for use in a ChoiceSet.

icon.description: Name of an icon to display for the choice.

value.description: The raw value for the choice. **NOTE:** do not use a `,` in the value, since a `ChoiceSet` with `isMultiSelect` set to `true` returns a comma-delimited string of choice values.

Tab.description: Defines a container that is part of a TabSet.

items.description: The card elements to include in the `Tab`.

Column.description: Defines a container that is part of a ColumnSet.

items.description: The card elements to include in the `Column`.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the `Column` is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

width.description: `"auto"`, `"stretch"`, or a number representing relative width of the column in the column group.

ActionSet.description: ActionSet allows actions to be displayed within a card.

actions.description: The Actions to show in the card's action bar.

actionStyle.description: How to display the action set.

label.description: Text displayed as label if ActionSet is in dropdown style.

TabSet.description: TabSet allows to display content through various tabs.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

tabs.description: The array of `Tabs` to divide content.

ColumnSet.description: ColumnSet divides a region into Columns, allowing elements to sit side-by-side.

columns.description: The array of `Columns` to divide the region into.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the `ColumnSet` is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

color.description: Controls the color of the Container.

items.description: The card elements to render inside the `Container`.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the `Container` is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

verticalContentAlignment.description: Defines how the content should be aligned vertically within the container.

Fact.description: Describes a Fact in a FactSet as a key/value pair.

FactSet.description: The FactSet element displays a series of facts (i.e. name/value pairs) in a tabular form.

HorizontalAlignment.description: Controls how elements are horizontally positioned within their container.

MediaSource.description: Defines a source for a Media element

type.description: Whether the media is audio or video.

dataPath.description: Points to the holding the address.

multiline.description: Wether the address in multiple lines.

lineDelimited.description: The string of character(s) which the address is delimited by.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

PhaseBanner.description: Displays a banner highlighting a phase.

phase.description: The phase which the service is in.

Media.description: Displays a media player for audio or video content.

sources.description: Array of media sources to attempt to play.

poster.description: URL of an image to display before playing.

altText.description: Alternate text describing the audio or video.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the `Image` is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

ImageSet.description: The ImageSet displays a collection of Images similar to a gallery.

images.description: The array of `Image` elements to show.

ImageSize.description: Controls the approximate size of the image. The physical dimensions will vary per host. Specify `"auto"` for true image dimension, or `"stretch"` to force it to fill the container.

Input.ChoiceSet.description: Allows a user to input a Choice.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

isMultiSelect.description: Allow multiple choices to be selected.

value.description: The initial choice (or set of choices) that should be selected. For multi-select, specify a comma-separated string of values.

Input.Date.description: Lets a user choose a date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

max.description: Hint of maximum value expressed in ISO-8601 format (may be ignored by some clients).

min.description: Hint of minimum value expressed in ISO-8601 format (may be ignored by some clients).

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no selection has been made.

value.description: The initial value for this field expressed in ISO-8601 format.

clearable.description: Whether the user can clear the data.

Input.Number.description: Allows a user to enter a number.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

max.description: Hint of maximum value (may be ignored by some clients).

min.description: Hint of minimum value (may be ignored by some clients).

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no selection has been made.

Input.Slider.description: Lets a user enter value with a slider.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

value.description: The initial value for this field.

Input.FileUpload.description: Lets a user upload a file.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

Input.Email.description: Lets a user enter an email.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

icon.description: Name of an icon to prefix email input with.

Input.Currency.description: Lets a user enter a currency value.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no text has been input.

max.description: Hint of maximum value (may be ignored by some clients).

min.description: Hint of minimum value (may be ignored by some clients).

Input.Address.description: Lets a user enter an address.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

Input.ApiLookup.description: Lets a user look up a value via an API.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

showPagination.description: Whether or not to show pagination for the results

resultsPerPage.description: Amount of results to show per page

buttonText.description: Text to display for the button to launch the api lookup

endpoint.description: The endpoint to gather results from.

results.description: Path to the results of the api lookup

totalHits.description: Path to the value of the total hits from the results of the api lookup

Input.Gender.description: Lets a user enter a gender.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

term.description: Whether the gender or sex should be asked.

preferNotToSay.description: Includes Prefer not to say gender in list.

preferToSelfDescribe.description: Includes Prefer not to self describe gender in list.

Input.Name.description: Lets a user enter a name.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

icon.description: Name of an icon to prefix name input with.

Input.Signature.description: Lets a user enter a signature.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

agreement.description: Agreement text to be displayed above the signature pad.

saveText.description: Customise the text of the save button.

guidance.description: Guidance text to be displayed with the signature button.

Input.TelephoneNumber.description: Lets a user enter a telephone number.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

connectionType.description: What type of phone is this number related to?.

icon.description: Name of an icon to prefix telephone-number input with.

Input.DateTime.description: Lets a user enter a telephone number.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no text has been input.

clearable.description: Whether the user can clear the data.

withSeconds.description: Whether to display and allow the user to enter seconds

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

isMultiline.description: If `true`, allow multiple lines of input.

maxLength.description: Hint of maximum length characters to collect (may be ignored by some clients).

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no text has been input.

value.description: The initial value for this field.

editor.description: Whether the field should be a WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) editor, if false then plain text field.

Input.Time.description: Lets a user select a time.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

max.description: Hint of maximum value (may be ignored by some clients).

min.description: Hint of minimum value (may be ignored by some clients).

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no time has been selected.

value.description: The initial value for this field expressed in ISO-8601 format.

Input.Toggle.description: Lets a user choose between two options.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

value.description: The current selected value. If the item is selected that "valueOn" will be used, otherwise "valueOff"

valueOff.description: The value when toggle is off

valueOn.description: The value when toggle is on

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

arrayPath.description: Points to the array of data to be displayed.

selectionType.description: Whether the use can select a value.

rowKey.description: Points to the object key that uniquely identifies the record

templates.description: Templates to render when displaying the list items

label.description: Template to render for the label of the list item

sublabel.description: Template to render for the sublabel of the list item

stamp.description: Template to render for the stamp of the list item

showLaunches.description: Whether to show launches menu for list items

showTotal.description: Whether to show the value of the total amount of items in the list

notFoundText.description: Text to display if nothing to display in the list

clickToLaunch.description: Whether to make the item label launchable

Tree.description: Displays some information in a tree format.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

TreeItem.description: Nodes belonging to a tree structure

label.description: Title displayed for the tree item.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

arrayPath.description: Points to the array of data to be displayed.

rowKey.description: The property that uniquely identifies the row.

field.description: Points to the data to be displayed in the column.

showLaunches.description: Whether or not to show a menu of actions.

selectionType.description: Whether the use can select a value.

TextBlock.description: Displays text, allowing control over font sizes, weight, and color.

isSubtle.description: If `true`, displays text slightly toned down to appear less prominent.

maxLines.description: Specifies the maximum number of lines to display.

wrap.description: If `true`, allow text to wrap. Otherwise, text is clipped.

SeparatorStyle.description: Indicates whether there should be a visible separator (i.e. a line) between the element and its predecessor. If not specified, no separator is displayed. A separator will only be displayed if there is a preceding element.

SpacingStyle.description: Controls the amount of spacing between this element and the preceding element.

Jumbotron.description: An element typically placed at the top of a card to describe its purpose.

title.description: Text to be displayed as heading.

subtitle.description: Text to be displayed as subheading.

wash.description: Type of wash to have over the background.

backgroundImage.description: Relative URL to image to be displayed as background.

Chip.description: A chip to display some text.

text.description: Text to be displayed in chip.

Collapsible.description: A container which expands when clicked on to show a card.

title.description: Text to be displayed as label.

CardList.description: A container which opens a modal when clicked on to show a card.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with the element.

addButtonLabel.description: Text to be displayed as label of button.

instanceTitleTemplate.description: A handlebars-like template for conjuring a title per instance.

instanceSubtitleTemplate.description: A handlebars-like template for conjuring a subtitle per instance.
